attr.title: Iconoclasts
attr.desc: Iconoclasts is a captivating action-adventure game that follows the journey of Robin, a mechanic who battles against a tyrannical religious authority in a beautifully crafted pixel art world.
attr.inst: You must have a copy of Iconoclasts for Linux copied to the ports/iconoclasts/gamedata folder.  Be sure the folder contains subfolders named bin32, bin64 and data.
